description: Metadata on an organisation (e.g., university, hospital, institution, etc.) including aliases and geolocation (ideally from ROR)
A country is a region legally identified as a distinct entity in political geography.
A city is a relatively large and permanent settlement.
Latitude is a geographic coordinate which refers to the angle from a point on the Earth's surface to the equatorial plane. Can be considered as the Y-axis

Longitude is a geographic position that refers to the angle east or west of a reference meridian between the two geographical poles to another meridian that passes through an arbitrary point. Can be considered as the X-axis
